overview_of_class: Organizations are a central part of society. From work to school to sports, organizations play a critical role in structuring our lives. In this course we will consider the nature of organizations, various ways that organizations function, and how we can better navigate within these systems. Throughout the course we will consider questions around individual autonomy in the face of organizational structures. We will pay particular attention to push toward increased standardization in the workplace and our lives.
name: Sociology of Organizations
title: SCS SOCIOL 302-CN-15 Sociology of Organizations
